name: Is it OK to pick up Anomalies at a University?
name_original: Is it OK to pick up Anomalies at a University?
description:
This is a prototype for a visual novel about dating SCPs. 

We are a group of eight gamedesign students making "Is it ok to pick up anomalies in a dungeon" for a course. We aim to answer the question "Would you date an SCP?" by making an SCP dating sim/visual novel. We are currently planning to include: 
SCP-049 SCP-1471 SCP-5031 for the release of the first version of the game in January 2022.

Made with Ren'Py.

If you would like to help us with development by giving some quick feedback, please fill out this form: https://forms.gle/n8eZmJaSFVXC2noAA

To play: Download the zip file and unzip. Run the "ALPHAVERSION" executable.
